instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.A1534: What is A1534? A1534 is a model number for a 12 inch size Macbook  from years 2015, 2016 with EMC 2746, that may contain one of these boards depending on the year & configuration: 820-00045, 820-00244..
definitions.820-00687A: What is 820-00687A? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
Hello
i have this macbook <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER> with liquid damage on the keyboard but the motherboard looks perfect
It didn't turn on and I noticed that the keyboard flat was oxidized. after cleaning it the mac turns on regularly and both keyboard and trakpad work perfectly. My problem is that I have no audio unless I try to raise or lower the prohibition symbol appears
some idea?

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
Clean audio flex and connectors.
Also try known good audio board.

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
Tried cleaning the flats and board but they were clean
On system preferences / sound / output I don't see the speakers.
Could they be the problem? unfortunately I don't have another board or speakers to test

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
Is the audio codec recognized in System Report?
Headphones sound also not available?

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message: no sound in headphones no codec

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
What is the exact 820-xxxxx code of your board?
Must post this when you open new thread.

Audio codec is on RIO (audio) board.
I suspect flex, connectors, or audio board...

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message: sorry the board is <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-00687A</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>

threads.title: Audio problem with <MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>A1534</MACBOOK MODEL NUMBER>
threads.message:
Check voltages and signals for J6799.

"I suspect flex, connectors, or audio board"
Don't forget that...
